title: Cleopatra VII: Daughter of the Nile - 57 B.C.
description: Established "Dear America" author Kristiana Gregory kicks off "The Royal Diaries" with the captivating story of a young Cleopatra's life. While her father is in hiding after attempts on his life, twelve-year-old Cleopatra records in her diary how she fears for her own safety and hopes to survive to become Queen of Egypt some day.Duration: 3 hours 30 minutes
author: Kristiana Gregory
